tweets.text:

#Xu Fengfan Cast in Drama!

Starting January 12, 2026 (Mon. Holiday) 
Fuji TV Mondays at 9 Drama "#Yandoku!"

Xu Fengfan will play the role of Song Li Han!

Broadcast every Monday 21:00~
Please tune in

â–¼Program HP
https://fujitv.co.jp/yandoku_fuji/

@yandoku_fuji
#INI

tweets.author: zuzu
tweets.text: It's striking how he's regretting not being able to hit those high notes, and to think Fenfan would end up like this...

tweets.author: Quant Data
tweets.text:
$MSTR is up over 5%

Sign-up for our 7-day free trial to see data like this!

Fenfan Moon 9
Fenfan intern

Too perfect, is this a dream? If it's a dream, I hope it never ends

tweets.author: ã¾ã‚ã“
tweets.text: Congratulations on Fen Fan appearing in the Moon 9 drama~~!!  Isn't it amazing?! I was so shocked~~ And this time it's as a trainee doctor! Lawyer, air traffic controller, etc., experiencing all sorts of different lives vicariously through the roles! Looking forward to it

tweets.author: ã¿ãƒã•ã‚“@MINI
tweets.text: Congratulations on your appearance in Frieren!  Your white coat look suits you so well! I'm really looking forward to seeing what kind of character you'll play and what kind of performance you'll deliver again!
